name: Speccy Snapshot
summary: Learn about .SPECCY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: A Speccy snapshot functions similar to a photograph as it records the state of your computer at a specific point in time. A snapshot is helpful for when you modify or upgrade your PC.

To create a Speccy snapshot, select File â†’ Save Snapshot, name the file, and choose the save location. The file can only be opened by Speccy but you can export the information as an .XML or .TXT file or publish it on the web.

description: Snapshot created by Speccy, a tool that enables you to explore your PC; stores a set of information about your computer system at a certain point in time.
